mapper.insert: insert into notice (calendarId, category, id, title, location, isAllDay, start, end) values (#{calendarId}, #{category}, #{id}, #{title}, #{location}, #{isAllDay}, #{start}, #{end})
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, location = #{location}, isAllDay = #{isAllDay}, start = #{start}, end = #{end} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from notice where date(start) <= date(now()) and date(end) >= date(now())
